content: Create a group to add them to the room

comment.text: This translation key is used for the text displayed when a user creates a new group to add members to the current room. The text appears in an option within a create group dialog or button.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'إنشاء مجموعة لإضافتهم إلى الغرفة' is a literal translation but doesn't fully capture the intended meaning of 'Create a group to add them to the room'. It sounds slightly awkward in Arabic. A more natural phrasing would be 'لإنشاء مجموعة وإضافتهم إليها' or 'لإضافة أفراد إلى غرفة عن طريق إنشاء مجموعة'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لإضافة أفراد إلى غرفة عن طريق إنشاء مجموعة

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vytvořit skupinu a přidat je do místnosti' is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the meaning of the English phrase 'Create a group to add them to the room'. It implies that you are creating a group *and then* adding them. A more natural and concise phrasing would better reflect the original intent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vytvořte skupinu pro přidání do místnosti

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Luo ryhmä lisätäksesi heidät huoneeseen' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Finnish. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Luo ryhmä, johon heidät voi lisätä huoneeseen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb form 'lisätäksesi' is grammatically correct, but stylistically, it may be improved in the revised suggestion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: N/A - addressed in the incorrect_translation suggestion

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Créez un groupe pour ajouter ses membres à la salle' isn't a direct or natural equivalent of "Create a group to add them to the room." 'ses membres' implies the members of something previously mentioned, which isn't clear from the English. A more accurate translation would preserve the more general meaning of 'them'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Créez un groupe pour les y ajouter.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation 'Crea un gruppo per aggiungerli nella stanza1' includes 'stanza1' which is likely a placeholder or error. The intended meaning is 'to add them to the room'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Crea un gruppo per aggiungerli nella stanza

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'グループを作成してルームに追加する' while technically correct, lacks the nuance of the original English. "Create a group to add them to the room" implies adding *people* to the room, and the Japanese translation is more generic, meaning 'add to the room'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: グループを作成して、その人たちをルームに追加する

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ສ້າງກຸ່ມເພື່ອກໍານົດໃຫ້ເຂົາເຈົ້າເຂົ້າຫ້ອງ" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Create a group to add them to the room". The phrase 'ກໍານົດໃຫ້ເຂົາເຈົ້າ' (kanot hai khao jao) means 'to designate/assign them', which isn't quite the intended meaning of 'add them'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສ້າງກຸ່ມເພື່ອນຳເຂົາເຈົ້າເຂົ້າຫ້ອງ (Sang kum peuan nam khao jao khao hong)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Izveidojiet grupu, lai tos pievienotu telpai' isn't the most natural or idiomatic translation of 'Create a group to add them to the room'. While technically correct, it sounds a bit formal and clunky. A more natural phrasing might use a more direct verb for 'add'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izveidojiet grupu, lai pievienotu tos istabā

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Creați un grup pentru a le adăuga la sala' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Romanian. 'le' is vague and doesn't specify what 'them' refers to.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Creați un grup pentru a-i adăuga în cameră.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'sala' translates to 'room' but 'cameră' might be a more natural word in this context, especially when referring to a group chat or meeting space.
The translation 'කාණ්ඩයක් සාදා ඔවුන්ව කාමරයට එක් කරන්න.' while understandable, is a bit literal. A more natural translation would convey the meaning of 'to add them to a room by creating a group'.

The English phrase "Create a group to add them to the room" implies a user action to add members to a room. The Serbian translation "Kreirajte grupu da biste ih dodali u sobu" is a literal translation and slightly awkward. A more natural Serbian phrasing would emphasize the purpose of creating the group.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kreirajte grupu za dodavanje članova u sobu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '新建群组以将它们添加到此房间' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. '它们' (tamen) is vague and doesn't specify what 'them' refers to.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 新建群组以便将成员添加到房间

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '此房间' (ci fangjian) feels slightly formal. Depending on the context, a more conversational alternative might be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 新建群组以便将成员添加到房间
